mapper.select: select N.*, NF.* from qna N left join qnaFiles NF on N.num = NF.num where N.num=#{num}
mapper.update: update qna set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
update qna set step = step+1 where ref = (select ref from qna where num=#{num}) and step > (select step from qna where num=#{num})
mapper.insert: insert into qna (title, writer, contents, ref, step, depth) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, (select ref from qna Q where num=#{num}), (select step+1 from qna Q where num=#{num}), (select depth+1 from qna Q where num=#{num}))
insert into qna(title, writer, contents) values (#{title},#{writer},#{contents})
mapper.update: update qna set ref=#{num} where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into qnaFiles (num, fileName, oriName) values (#{num}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
